intent.user_query: Calculate the average number of service tickets opened per month.

phases.goal: Execute SQL query on fitness_db: SELECT AVG(TicketCount) AS AverageTicketsPerMonth FROM (SELECT EXTRACT(YEAR FROM TicketDate) AS Year, EXTRACT(MONTH FROM TicketDate) AS Month, COUNT(*) AS TicketCount FROM fitness_db.ServiceTickets GROUP BY 1, 2) AS Subquery;

arguments.sql: SELECT AVG(TicketCount) AS AverageTicketsPerMonth FROM (SELECT EXTRACT(YEAR FROM TicketDate) AS Year, EXTRACT(MONTH FROM TicketDate) AS Month, COUNT(*) AS TicketCount FROM fitness_db.ServiceTickets GROUP BY 1, 2) AS Subquery;

phases.goal: Generate the final report based on the query results.
